definitions.definition: To cause something to change from being concentrated at one point to being distributed across a number of points.
To reduce the authority of a governing body by distributing that authority among several bodies.
In police terminology, to bring a suspect to the ground by use of directed force; a tackle .

main_definition: To cause something to change from being concentrated at one point to being distributed across a number of points.
secondary_definitions: To reduce the authority of a governing body by distributing that authority among several bodies.
( US ) In police terminology, to bring a suspect to the ground by use of directed force; a tackle .
